meanings.definition: A person who has an autoimmune disorder that makes them intolerant to gluten.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a coeliacs and cannot eat foods with gluten.
meanings.sent2: Many coeliacs have to carefully read food labels to avoid gluten.
meanings.sent3: Why did the coeliacs bring their own gluten-free cake to the party? To make sure they could enjoy dessert!
meanings.sent4: The coeliacs in our group is like a gluten detective, always spotting hidden gluten in dishes.
meanings.sent5: Living as a coeliacs means always being mindful of what you eat to stay healthy.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to consume gluten due to an autoimmune disorder.
meanings.sent1: Her coeliacs prevents her from eating pizza and pasta.
meanings.sent2: The coeliacs of my cousin requires her to follow a strict gluten-free diet.
meanings.sent3: The coeliacs of the cat made it impossible for the owner to share their sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The coeliacs of the city was evident in the abundance of gluten-free restaurants.
meanings.sent5: Living with coeliacs means finding creative ways to enjoy meals without gluten.
